name: Vori
headline: Vori is a modern operating system for supermarkets
description: Vori offers a modern operating system designed for the grocery industry. VoriOS helps independent and regional grocers streamline their inventory management, ordering, and supplier coordination, allowing them to operate more efficiently and profitably. The platform integrates real-time data to optimize stock replenishment and improve pricing strategies. Founded in 2019, Vori empowers grocers with technology that levels the playing field against larger retailers.

# Meet Vori: Your Comprehensive Grocery Store POS & Operations Software
The grocery point-of-sale system and store management platform for independent grocers.
[Watch the video](https://www.vori.com/<#>)
From The Bay to Brooklyn, VoriOS is trusted by the most ambitious independent grocers
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fbc78fddd497e335e677763/6686edcd94eef07eda11099e_Arlington%20Market.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fbc78fddd497e335e677763/6686ee37024c76c81c6eb2a3_Suruki.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fbc78fddd497e335e677763/6686eed9024c76c81c6f12c9_Dean%27s.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fbc78fddd497e335e677763/6686eeee5cfab3e29abb2131_Real%20Produce.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fbc78fddd497e335e677763/6686ef7a8d8ad4756bf70300_Carla%27s.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fbc78fddd497e335e677763/6686ef5c68993a77b16862b9_Green%20Fish.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fbc78fddd497e335e677763/6687028d046e0492311132b1_Square%20Customer%20Logos_Marinwood%20Market.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fbc78fddd497e335e677763/6686ef2b769812102129f906_Williams.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fbc78fddd497e335e677763/66870391b139e758de72b062_Estudillo.png)

## A full store solution
VoriOS is a comprehensive suite of modern hardware and supplier-integrated software that connects your front-of-house, back office, and shoppers on one platform.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fbc78fddd497e335e677763/667c24bd37b197a561f0c2b4_prod-render_pos.png)
[POS System](https://www.vori.com/</pos>)
A fast, user-friendly, and dual-sided POS system that keeps your grocery store running and your shoppers in the loop.
### [Point-of-Sale SystemA fast, user-friendly, and dual-sided POS system that keeps your grocery store running and your shoppers in the loop.POS System](https://www.vori.com/</pos>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fbc78fddd497e335e677763/667c24c84664600c431d2f64_prod-render_payment.png)
[Payment Processing](https://www.vori.com/</pos>)
VoriOS is PCI-compliant and accepts a wide range of payment forms–EBT, contactless, and gift cards included.
### [Payment ProcessingVoriOS is PCI-compliant and accepts a wide range of payment forms–EBT, contactless, and gift cards included.Payment processing](https://www.vori.com/</pos>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fbc78fddd497e335e677763/6696c1d898ad38ca053f6bd6_Back%20Office%20Home%20page.png)
[Back Office](https://www.vori.com/</back-office>)
Streamline your ordering, receiving, and invoice processing workflows by integrating directly with your suppliers’ data.
### [Back OfficeStreamline your ordering, receiving, and invoice processing workflows by integrating directly with your suppliers’ data.Back office](https://www.vori.com/</back-office>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fbc78fddd497e335e677763/669827d61338adcb7a3858c5_%20Invoices%20-%20Price%20Changes%20Page_1_5x.webp)
[Price Changes](https://www.vori.com/</margin>)
Increase your profitability and reduce labor and errors with automated margin protection and instant shelf price updates.
### [Price ChangesIncrease your profitability and reduce labor and errors with automated margin protection and instant shelf price updates.Price changes](https://www.vori.com/</margin>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fbc78fddd497e335e677763/6696c1e333140108a158a7aa_Shopper%20Home%20page.png)
[Shopper Engagement](https://www.vori.com/</shopper>)
Understand your customers' buying habits and craft marketing messages and a loyalty program to increase foot traffic and visits. 
### [Customer Loyalty & MarketingUnderstand your customers' buying habits and craft marketing messages and a loyalty program to increase foot traffic and visits. Shopper Engagement](https://www.vori.com/</shopper>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fbc78fddd497e335e677763/662ff21501a515538ef3d749_early-access_cta-wordmark.png)
## It’s your turn to upgrade
Is VoriOS a good fit for your store? Schedule a virtual demo, meet us at a grocery store in your area, or talk to sales to verify.
[Talk to sales](https://www.vori.com/</demo/brick-and-mortar-retailer>)

generated_description:
**Vori: The Modern Operating System for Grocery Stores**

Founded in 2019 and part of Y Combinator's W20 batch, Vori is on a mission to level the playing field for independent and regional grocers against their larger competitors. Based in East Palo Alto, CA, with a dedicated team of 29 employees, Vori has developed a comprehensive modern operating system—VoriOS—aimed specifically at the grocery industry.

**What Is VoriOS?**

VoriOS streamlines the core operations of a grocery store, including inventory management, ordering, and supplier coordination. By integrating real-time data, it empowers grocers to optimize stock replenishment and pricing strategies, enabling them to operate more efficiently and profitably. 

The platform features several critical components:
- **Point-of-Sale (POS) System**: A user-friendly, dual-sided POS that keeps operations smooth and customers informed.
- **Back Office Management**: Tools that simplify ordering, receiving, and invoice processing by directly accessing supplier data.
- **Price Changes Management**: Automated systems that enhance profitability by ensuring accurate shelf pricing and reducing labor errors.
- **Shopper Engagement**: Features designed to understand customer buying habits and boost foot traffic through effective marketing and loyalty programs.

**Real Impact and Feedback**

Users across the country—from the bustling streets of Brooklyn to local markets in the Bay Area—report significant improvements in efficiency. For instance, grocers have noted faster checkout lines and enhanced customer experiences, which translates into happier customers and, ultimately, more sales. 

Vori is led by Michael Seibel as Group Partner, and its commitment to using technology to empower smaller retailers is evident throughout its innovative platform.

If you're interested in seeing how Vori can revolutionize grocery operations at your store, you can [book a demo](https://www.vori.com/</demo/brick-and-mortar-retailer>) or visit their website for more details.

**Connect with Vori**: 
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/VoriHQ)
- [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/vori)
- [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/vorihq/)
- [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/vorihq)

In short, Vori isn’t just about selling a service; it's about reshaping the grocery landscape one independent store at a time.
